<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The VE backend uses a two-staged process to lower and legalize vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 VP and standard vector SDNodes are lowered to SDNodes of the VVP&#95;&#42; layer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     All VVP nodes have a mask and an Active Vector Length (AVL) parameter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     The AVL parameters refers to the element position in the vector the VVP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     node operates on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2 The VVP SDNodes are legalized. The AVL in a legal VVP node refers to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     chunks of 64bit. We track this by wrapping the AVL in a LEGALAVL node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     The AVL mechanism in the VE architecture always refers to chunks of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     64bit, regardless of the actual element type vector instructions are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     operating on. For vector types v256.32 or v256.64 nothing needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     legalized since each element occupies a 64bit chunk - there is no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     difference between counting 64bit chunks or element positions. However,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     all vector types with &gt; 256 elements store more than one logical element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     per 64bit chunk and need to be transformed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     However legalization is performed, the resulting legal VVP SDNodes will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     have a LEGALAVL node as their AVL operand. The LEGALAVL nodes wraps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     around an AVL that refers to 64 bit chunks just as the architecture</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     demands - that is, the wrapped AVL is the correct setting for the VL</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     register for this VVP operation to get the desired behavior.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AVL Functions &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The AVL operand position of this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;int&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a14dbf0c55e1b78f05c19e973c5b54dcd">getAVLPos</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Whether this is a LEGALAVL node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84e306a52da2372d1d398fb5a3c75c81">isLegalAVL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> AVL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The AVL operand of this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a79438cba679d9bd714fcf1ac660aa9dd">getNodeAVL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask position of this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;int&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab12a9d38978cd2f625970c4d24ba76d5">getMaskPos</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aea6f240eaff69e5a5f5dc5108abecfc5">getNodeMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the AVL operand of this node. If it is a LEGALAVL node, unwrap it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return with the boolean whether unwrapping happened.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;SDValue, bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab36c9d24e2e9bf7f23e297e087acb8ce">getAnnotatedNodeAVL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125; AVL Functions</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Whether this VP&#95;REDUCE&#95;&#42;/ VECREDUCE&#95;&#42;/VVP&#95;REDUCE&#95;&#42; SDNode has a start</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125; Node Properties</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6405223942a3a52775bb99d512dca2ad"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6405223942a3a52775bb99d512dca2ad">Packing</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6405223942a3a52775bb99d512dca2ada960b44c579bc2f6818d2daaf9e4c16f0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6405223942a3a52775bb99d512dca2ada960b44c579bc2f6818d2daaf9e4c16f0">Normal</a> = 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 256 element standard mode.</span></CodeLine>
